mapper.select: select id,name,address,code,icon,pid,seq,createdatetime,bankName,bankCard,bankUser, prov,city,contact,mobile,telphone,domain,orgType from sys_organization order by seq

select t.id as id, t.name as name,t.address as address,t.code as code,t.icon as icon,t.pid as pid,t.seq as seq,t.createdatetime as createdatetime, t.bankName as bankName,t.bankCard as bankCard,t.bankUser as bankUser, t.prov as prov,t.city as city,t.contact as contact,t.mobile as mobile,t.telphone as telphone,t.domain as domain,t.orgType as orgType, plt.money as money, plt.available_balance as availableBalance from sys_organization t left join pltm_account plt on t.id = plt.organization_id order by seq

select id,name,address,code,icon,pid,seq,createdatetime,bankName,bankCard,bankUser, prov,city,contact,mobile,telphone,domain,orgType from sys_organization
where pid=#{pid}
where pid is null
order by seq

select id,name,address,code,icon,pid,seq,createdatetime,bankName,bankCard,bankUser, prov,city,contact,mobile,telphone,domain,orgType from sys_organization
where orgType=#{orgType} and domain != ''
order by seq

select id,name,address,code,icon,pid,seq,createdatetime,bankName,bankCard,bankUser, prov,city,contact,mobile,telphone,domain,orgType, keep_time_single keepTimeSingle,keep_time_charter keepTimeCharter, credit_over creditOver,credit_time creditTime,charges,zz_path zzPath from sys_organization where id=#{id}
